snippet.textDisplay: It's too bad I can't find this game anywhere like say Steam. I'd really like to play it but it seems to require finding a copy and an old computer. Lucasarts, this is why rereleases are good, for those who didn't play the first time.

snippet.textDisplay: Aha, I knew it! Since the very first second of this song, my face lit up with a ridiculous smile. Love Grim Fandango. Its such a shame that Tim Schafer seems to get the short end of the stick. Everything he's worked on has been great, but unfortunately doesn't seem to get the recognition they deserve. As always, I am quite impressed by your picks Supra!
snippet.textOriginal: Aha, I knew it! Since the very first second of this song, my face lit up with a ridiculous smile. Love Grim Fandango. Its such a shame that Tim Schafer seems to get the short end of the stick. Everything he's worked on has been great, but unfortunately doesn't seem to get the recognition they deserve. As always, I am quite impressed by your picks Supra!

snippet.textDisplay: @OhhhMyAxels I think this is my favorite game of all time in large part because this soundtrack fit so well.  I don't really like listening to it on its own very often, but it was an irreplaceable part of the game itself.
snippet.textOriginal: @OhhhMyAxels I think this is my favorite game of all time in large part because this soundtrack fit so well.  I don't really like listening to it on its own very often, but it was an irreplaceable part of the game itself.

snippet.textDisplay:
Oh god, thank you ! So many memories ! I bought this game as a second choice ... I wanted Monkey Island, but the guy working there told me that this game was better. I wasn't sure, but I bought it anyway ... and what a great choice I made ! I finished this game loads of times.

This game is my top 2, coming only after Chrono Cross. What a great game ! Amazing.
snippet.textOriginal:

This game is my top 2, coming only after Chrono Cross. What a great game ! Amazing.

snippet.textDisplay:
Really miss the good old day when Point-and-Click Adventure games were around :(

Come on LucasArts, stop milking the Star Wars license and go back to your roots!, Monkey Island, Grim Fandango, Full Throttle, Day of The Tentacle etc.., WE WANT RE-RELEASES!
snippet.textOriginal:
Really miss the good old day when Point-and-Click Adventure games were around :(

Come on LucasArts, stop milking the Star Wars license and go back to your roots!, Monkey Island, Grim Fandango, Full Throttle, Day of The Tentacle etc.., WE WANT RE-RELEASES!
